name: New Zealand International Commercial Pilot Academy
about: The New Zealand International Commercial Pilot Academy (NZICPA), based at Whanganui Airport, has a strong history of successfully training professional and recreational pilots. We offer a comprehensive range of flight training courses, from private to commercial licenses, flight instructors, multi-engine pilots, and full instrument ratings. Our instructors are highly experienced and committed to safety and student success. As a provincially based flight training school, we keep costs down while providing a broad cultural base and diverse training environments, including busy regional airports and military bases. We are a NZCAA Certificated Aviation Training Organisation and a NZQA registered Private Training Establishment, ensuring the highest standards in education and training. Our focus is on producing well-skilled graduates ready to succeed in team flying environments, making New Zealand an outstanding country to develop and practice your aviation skills.
services: ["New Zealand Pilot Licences and Ratings\nNew Zealand Diploma in Aviation"]
